permissions: Authorization is checked by RetainerPaymentPolicy, which delegates destroy? to RetainerPeriodPolicy/RetainerPolicy. RetainerPolicy only defines scope rules (buyer/seller org membership) and does not define explicit destroy? rules.
side_effects: Deletes the retainer payment record if allowed.
validation_notes: Requires <id> argument (retainer payment ID). --confirm flag is required. Server blocks deletion when status is batched or exported.
